metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1193 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in setup_async_work in the KSMBDimplementation of the in-kernel samba server and CIFS in the Linux kernel.This issue could allow an attacker to crash the system by accessing freedwork.

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-aws package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
